price: 14. “Dit is het vuur dat jullie plachten te ontkennen.
arabic: هَٰذِهِ ٱلنَّارُ ٱلَّتِي كُنتُم بِهَا تُكَذِّبُونَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: hādhihi al-nāru allatī kuntum bihā tukadhibūna
